title: Delhi court frames sexual harassment charges against BJP MP Brij Bhushan Singh
comments: It'll be the best thing only if there's a proper follow up with punishments for these scumbags. Aise toh we've seen a lot of such cases where criminals related to one party were charged or even arrested but later on, nothing significant really happened.
